apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts two women with light to medium-light skin tones leaning in for a tender kiss, their cheeks gently touching. Apple’s signature glossy 3D shading imbues their faces with a soft glow, highlighting the smooth gradients and rounded edges that convey a feeling of warmth and affection. The subtle blush on their cheeks and the gentle curve of their lips, rendered with Apple’s characteristic realistic lighting, beautifully represent love, romance, and intimacy in digital conversations.
